channel.title: Comments on: Apply now for your school to join MissionV

item.title: By: Carmel O'Sullivan
item.dc:creator: Carmel O'Sullivan
item.description: We are currently upgrading our computer lab and have just installed enough waps in the school to allow classrooms to use wifi enabled hardware with a view to investigating game based learning and VLE's which we see as part of education going forward. Teachers also completed a VLE course last week and are very keen to utilise technology in a more effective and productive way.
item.content:encoded: We are currently upgrading our computer lab and have just installed enough waps in the school to allow classrooms to use wifi enabled hardware with a view to investigating game based learning and VLE’s which we see as part of education going forward. Teachers also completed a VLE course last week and are very keen to utilise technology in a more effective and productive way.
